attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It's time TV cleaned up its act. If you think British television needs to treat members of the public fairly and with respect, please add your name to this list. We'll take the petition to Number 10 to demand that a Royal Commission is set up to look into the practices of this industry where the public is involved.

Many thanks for adding your voice!

Jane and Chris
(British Quiz Association)
